name: Bubble Dinosaur: Ancient Shooter (krugergame)
description:
Aim, and Pop, Blast Colorful Bubbles!
Explore the Primitive bubble pop adventures with Stella the mother dinosaur and her baby dragons.
More than 2,000 levels to go playing! You will find it very fun and addictive!
Well-designed levels with various game modes will take your breath away!

It is popular at all over the world! For all ages, no matter elderly, housewives, women, pretty girls, handsome man love Bubble Dinosaur: Ancient Shooter.

COOL FEATURES:
* Easy and Fun Play
* Tons of Exciting & Unique Levels
* Breathtaking Visual effects
* Harmonious Music
* Excellent Replay Value
* No WiFi? No problem! Play offline!

It can Bring relax and happy to you, help you kill your boring time. And train your brain and finger. Are you alone? We will be with you.

Unlike word puzzle, mahjong, card and other casino game, Bubble Dinosaur is suitable for all countries and all language. It is simple and funny! It is one of the best matching and puzzle game!

You can try to download Bubble Dinosaur. Play it with your family.
